Subskills.name: Timed Fire
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of blazing trail.

Subskills.name: Scorch
Subskills.description: Increased the damage dealt by blazing trail.

Subskills.name: Forking Flames
Subskills.description: Trails have a chance to fork.

Subskills.name: Expanded Flames
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of blazing trail.

Subskills.name: Flaming Steps
Subskills.description: Increases your movement speed while blazing trail is active.

Subskills.name: Agonizing Heat
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Burning Veins
Subskills.description: Trails inflict fire break on hit.

Subskills.name: Detonation Field
Subskills.description: Instead of flames now leaves behind fiery mines exploding into flaming fissures.

Subskills.name: Crackling Heat
Subskills.description: Chance of trails to pulsate every second.

Subskills.name: Fueled Flames
Subskills.description: Increases the tick rate of blazing trail.

Subskills.name: Circle of Fire
Subskills.description: You now send trails of fire outwards to all directions.

Subskills.name: Trail of Comets
Subskills.description: Now drops comets that explode into flames.
